full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Snow Removal Services

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number**:  WS3102266888-Doc3124955732
- **Solicitation Number**:  WS3102266888
- **Publication Date**:  October 31, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 19, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
- **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2025

### Notice Information
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contract Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Tender Description
The contractor is required to provide snow removal services, including spreading brine, sanding, and salting of all roads and parking lots for the Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt Properties in Greater Nanaimo, Vancouver Island, British Columbia.

### Key Procurement Details
- **Services to be Provided**: Snow removal services for all roads and parking lots
- **Locations**: Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt Properties in Greater Nanaimo, Vancouver Island, British Columbia
- **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Person**: Mike Sole, Sole mike.sole@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Tender Documents
[Access Tender Documents][1]

[1]: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14505452?extsite=MTQ1MDU0NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
